name: @darlean/webgateways-suite
description: Web Gateways Suite that acts as Web/API Gateway that invokes actors to serve HTTP requests

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run lint
scripts.preversion: npm run format && npm install && npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.version: git add -A src && git add package.json && git add ../../package-lock.json && git -C ../.. tag webgateways-suite-%npm_package_version%
scripts.postversion: git commit -m "Version upgrade to webgateways-suite-%npm_package_version%" && git push && git push --tags
scripts.precommit: npm run format && npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.doc: npx typedoc --skipErrorChecking --json typedoc-out.json &  npx docgen typedoc-out.json ./docs/

author: Theo van der Donk
